summary: A test suite that orchestrates complete coinjoin operations for the JoinMarket client, constructing wallets, orderbooks, and taker instances, executing mixing sessions, and verifying transaction signing and wallet synchronization across different wallet types and mixdepth configurations.
business_intent: Validate the correctness, reliability, and privacy guarantees of the JoinMarket coin mixing implementation, ensuring it functions properly with various wallet formats and mixdepth setups.
